statements: DELETE FROM geofencing_alerts WHERE vehicle_id = 10 AND alert_type = 'Speeding';
DELETE FROM geofencing_alerts WHERE alert_type = 'Speeding' AND vehicle_id = 123456;
DELETE FROM geofencing_alerts WHERE alert_id = 5 OR geographic_area = 'City Center';
DELETE FROM vehicle_locations WHERE location_name = 'Headquarters' AND latitude > 40.0;
DELETE FROM geofencing_rules WHERE alert_threshold < 5 AND rule_name = 'Restricted Area';
DELETE FROM vehicle_locations WHERE vehicle_id = 123 AND location_name = 'Warehouse A';
DELETE FROM geofencing_rules WHERE rule_name = 'Home Area' AND alert_threshold > 10;
DELETE FROM alert_history WHERE alert_type = 'Speeding' AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM geographic_area WHERE name = 'City Center';
